purpose: The code appears to collect system information including internal and external IP addresses, DNS servers, hostname, user info, and package details, then sends this data via an HTTPS POST request to a Discord webhook.
anomalies: Sending sensitive system information to external service without user consent
Use of deprecated or non-standard property ___resolved in package.json
No input validation or sanitization of collected data before sending
analysis: This code collects extensive system information including IP addresses, hostnames, user details, and package metadata. It then sends this sensitive data to a hardcoded Discord webhook URL, which constitutes a serious privacy and security risk. The code lacks any form of user consent mechanism or data minimization practices. Additionally, it uses potentially unsafe patterns such as directly parsing JSON from HTTP responses without error handling and sending raw system data without encryption.
conclusion: High security risk due to unauthorized collection and exfiltration of sensitive system information to a third-party service.
